description: Structured information about a digital object identifier, as standardized by the International Organization for Standardization.
label: Doi
name: DOI

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif._instruction: Enter the unique and persistent object identifier provided by the International Digital Object Identifier Foundation ('Digital Object Identifier'; DOI) as an internationalized resource identifier (IRI) following the defined pattern (i.e., 'https://doi.org/' + DOI).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.label: Identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.name: identifier
